name: Loot Of Piracy: Piratescape
description:
Explore the High Seas as a Pirate Adventurer! Battle for loot and unlock buried pirate treasure!  Fight off fearsome pirates and storm the pirate fortress.  Upgrade your stats and abilities!

An online multiplayer game made in 72 hours for KJam #1, May 8-10, 2020 by:

Luke Bajger - 3D Artist
Mia Beecham - 3D Artist
Neal Bulawan - Map Generator
Ashley Carey - Musician & Sound Designer
John Currie - Gameplay & Multiplayer Programmer
Marek Domagała - Composer & Sound Designer
Joshua Ra Goodman - Composer & Sound Designer
Jatin Korram - Programming

WASD to move, Mouse to look, Click to fire

You can also view the game at: http://johndcurrie.com/kjam/
